events.label: Webhook
events.name: webhook
events.description: Happens when a HTTP request hits the service URL. Must be a POST with content type application/json.

events.label: Webhook Sync
events.name: webhookSync
events.description: Happens when a HTTP request hits the service URL and needs a response from the listener. Must be a POST with content type application/json.

events.label: File Downloaded
events.name: fileDownloaded
events.description: Happens when a async download file process is finished (thrown by a GET function with 'forceDownload' enabled and 'downloadSync' disabled)

configuration.name: baseUrl
configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: The base URL where this service will send request to. If this is not specified, the complete URL must be included on the path param of each request.

configuration.name: defaultHeaders
configuration.label: Default headers
configuration.description: These headers will be added to all requests. The headers are comma-separated and have the 'key=value' form, per example: key=ABC123,client=456789

validation.message: The headers are comma-separated and have the 'key=value' form, per example: key=ABC123,client=456789. The field admits valid placeholders too.

configuration.name: emptyPath
configuration.label: Empty path
configuration.description: Value used when the path in the request is empty

configuration.name: authType
configuration.label: Authorization
configuration.description: Select the type of authorization to use on the requests. Valid values 'no', 'basic', 'digest', and with placeholders ('Custom' option).

configuration.name: username
configuration.label: Username
configuration.description: Name of the user to access to the external service

configuration.name: password
configuration.label: Password
configuration.description: Password of the user to access to the external service

configuration.name: rememberCookies
configuration.label: Remember cookies
configuration.description: If it is enabled, a basic system to exchange cookies is started: the service sends the last received cookies in subsequents requests. Valid values 'enable', 'disable', and with placeholders ('Custom' option).

configuration.name: allowExternalUrl
configuration.label: Allow External URLs
configuration.description: If it is enabled, the services admits call to paths that starts with 'http://' and 'https://' (using these paths, the baseUrl is ignored). Valid values 'enable', 'disable', and with placeholders ('Custom' option).

configuration.name: connectionTimeout
configuration.label: Connection timeout
configuration.description: Connect timeout interval, in milliseconds (0 = infinity). Default value: 5000 ms (5 sec)

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

configuration.name: readTimeout
configuration.label: Read timeout
configuration.description: Read timeout interval, in milliseconds (0 = infinity). Default value: 60000 ms (60 sec)

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

configuration.name: followRedirects
configuration.label: Follow redirects
configuration.description: Automatic redirection. If it is enabled, the client will automatically redirect to the URI declared in 3xx responses.

configuration.name: config
configuration.label: Webhooks configuration
configuration.value: You can pass the above webhook URL to services you want to integrate and you will get the webhook event in your app.
